Package management

Class CollectionManager

java.lang.Object
management.CollectionManager
public class CollectionManager extends Object
Stores the collection and info about it.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollectionManager

      public CollectionManager(String file)
      Collection initialization.
      Parameters:
      file - file with default collection.

  • Method Details

    • getFiles

      public ArrayList<String> getFiles()
      Returns:
      array of paths with scripts we met on our way.

    • fadd

      public void fadd(String path)
      Adds a path to array of scripts we used for our work.
      Parameters:
      path - a path to the script and it's name.

    • fclear

      public void fclear()
      Makes the array of scripts we met empty. Purpose: if we call one script second time while running the program, it would throw InfiniteLoopException though it should not.

    • getLastId

      public static Long getLastId()
      Returns:
      id of last element in collection (so that the new id should be lastId + 1).

    • setLastId

      public static void setLastId(Long Id)
      Changes the id of last element.
      Parameters:
      Id - id of new last element.

    • getCreationDate

      public ZonedDateTime getCreationDate()
      Returns:
      creationTime of the collection.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns:
      type of the collection for 'info' (Stack);

    • stack

      public Stack<Route> stack()
      Returns:
      instance of Stack with all elements.
